info.name: AdoptAPet API Collection
info.description:
# Introduction
The AdoptAPet API has three models: adoption-center, species-and-breed, adoptable-pet. This API documentation provides examples of REST Endpoints for each model and how instances of the model can be queried for.

response.name: Information about every Adoption Center in the Database
Information about Adoption Center with given ID

request.description: All Adoptable Pet Species and Breeds

response.name: Information about every Pet Species and Breed

item.name: Pet Species and Breed by ID

request.description: Adoptable Pet Species and Breed by ID

response.name: Information about Pet Species and Breed with given ID
Information about Adoptable Pet with give ID
